metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010023 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** GNU Libc current is affected by: Re-mapping current loaded library with malicious ELF file. The impact is: In worst case attacker may evaluate privileges. The component is: libld. The attack vector is: Attacker sends 2 ELF files to victim and asks to run ldd on it. ldd execute code. NOTE: Upstream comments indicate "this is being treated as a non-security bug and no real threat."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream does not consider this to be a security issue, as ldd should not be run on untrusted binaries. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
